features.featureTitle: Implement a backend “bootstrap admin” rule so that the Internet Identity user whose saved profile email equals "sanjeev.vohra@gmail.com" is always treated as an application administrator. This must (a) grant the caller admin privileges in backend authorization checks that rely on `AccessControl.isAdmin(...)` and (b) ensure the stored `UserProfile.extendedRole` for that principal is set to "Super Admin" so the frontend capability system (e.g., `manage_users`, `manage_config`) is enabled for that user.
